description: A secret prototype recovered from the archives. Unlocks a light rapid 25mm autocannon.
A secret prototype recovered from the archives. Unlocks a heavy 155mm ETC cannon.
A 140mm autocannon that fires tungsten rounds using electromagnetic technology to achieve higher muzzle velocities and improved armor penetration.
A 280mm autocannon that fires tungsten rounds using electromagnetic technology to achieve higher muzzle velocities and improved armor penetration.
A secret prototype recovered from ancient ruins. Unlocks a rapid 18mm ETC minigun.
An ancient weapon of unbridled rage. Unlocks the Hypervelocity Kinetic Cannon "Maelstrom".
A no longer as ancient weapon of questionable rage. Unlocks the Hypervelocity Kinetic Cannon "Maelstrom". Version Two.
An unleashed rage embodied in the Hypervelocity Kinetic Cannon "Maelstrom". Version Three with cutting-edge enhancements and unmatched power.
An advanced twin-barrel turret system inspired by the groundbreaking Hypervelocity Kinetic Cannon "Maelstrom."
An advanced twin-barrel turret system inspired by the groundbreaking Hypervelocity Kinetic Cannon "Maelstrom.". Version Two with improved performance.
An advanced twin-barrel turret system inspired by the groundbreaking Hypervelocity Kinetic Cannon "Maelstrom.". Version Three with cutting-edge enhancements.
Initial attempt at swarming micro missiles.

description: A secret prototype recovered from the archives. Unlocks a miniature water heat sink for small crafts.
Scavenged aluminium foam plating salvaged from scrapyards. Offers minimal protection but is better than nothing.
Scavenged aluminium fin radiator salvaged from scrapyards. Offers minimal cooling but is better than nothing.
An old salvaged vessel retrofitted for basic space travel. Not much to look at, but it gets the job done.
A Twin Nosed vessel with a single engine. A step up from the Junkraker, but still a far cry from modern designs.
